product_name: Outdoor Research Spitsbergen Beanie - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from an acrylic/wool blend with a windproof WINDSTOPPER(R) fleece lining, the Outdoor Research Kids' Spitsbergen Beanie keeps your little ones' heads warm as they point their skis downhill. Hat is 30% wool for natural breathability and insulation even when wet. WINDSTOPPER(R) polyester-fleece lining feels soft on tender skin and blocks chilly winds. Beanie also breathes and wicks moisture. Closeout.
short_description: Made from an acrylic/wool blend with a windproof WINDSTOPPER(R) fleece lining, the Outdoor Research Kids' Spitsbergen Beanie keeps your little ones' heads warm as they point their skis downhill.
